Key Match Events: Adam Zampa was named Player of the Match for his bowling figures of 4/47.
Mitchell Marsh scored 52 runs off 51 balls.
Josh Inglis scored 58 runs off 59 balls.
Dilshan Madushanka took 3 wickets for 38 runs.
Australia won by 5 wickets with 88 balls remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The match was held at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow.
Australia earned 2 points from the match while Sri Lanka earned 0 points.
